DOC.brief_summary: This will be a retrospective study and analysis of subjects who have undergone a hematopoietic stem transplant (either at OSUMC or external location) and were seen at OSUMC at any time between 01Jan2000 and 30Jun2011. This study will determine factors influencing pulmonary disease and associated treatment strategies.
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Disease in Patients Undergoing Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Adult patients who have undergone a hematopoietic stem transplant (either at OSUMC or external location) and were seen at OSUMC at any time between 01Jan2000 and 30Jun2011. Age > 18 years Age <18 years Prisoners
